languages.text: "Сожалею о твоих товарищах. Мужественные были воины".
"I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."
languages.original_text: "Сожалею о твоих товарищах. Мужественные были воины".

traits.locale_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."
"I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."
"I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."
"I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

languages.text: “我为你的兄弟们感到遗憾，他们都是勇敢的战士。”
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

traits.locale_text: “我为你的兄弟们感到遗憾，他们都是勇敢的战士。”

languages.text: «Lamento lo de sus hermanos. Eran valientes guerreros».
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento lo de sus hermanos. Eran valientes guerreros».

languages.text: 「お前の同胞のことは残念だった。彼らは勇敢な戦士だった」
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の同胞のことは残念だった。彼らは勇敢な戦士だった」

languages.text: "Mein Beileid zum Tod Eurer Brüder. Sie waren mutige Krieger."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Beileid zum Tod Eurer Brüder. Sie waren mutige Krieger."

languages.text: « Je vous {mf|désolé|désolée} pour vos frères. Ils se sont battus avec courage. »
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous {mf|désolé|désolée} pour vos frères. Ils se sont battus avec courage. »

languages.text: "Kardeşlerin için üzgünüm. İkisi de yürekli savaşçılarmış."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry about your brothers. They were courageous warriors."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerin için üzgünüm. İkisi de yürekli savaşçılardı."
